title: Taiwan OSATs boost spending as CoWoS supply tightens
description: Taiwan's leading semiconductor assembly and test providers are launching record capital spending programs to expand advanced packaging capacity, as shortages at TSMC push chip designers to seek alternative supply chains through 2026.
